1.0.name: wordpress/fluid-accessible-sorting-grid
1.0.description: Fluid Accessible Sorting Grid is a sorting grid of your blog's recent posts, recent comments, categories and meta and uses the Fluid WAI-ARIA enabled sorting list. Use it in a wide widget area, like the "First Footer Widget Area" of the "Twenty Ten" theme.
